00071 class /*KOSTORE_EXPORT*/ KoXmlNode
00072 {
00073 public:
00074 
00075     enum NodeType {
00076         NullNode = 0,
00077         ElementNode,
00078         TextNode,
00079         CDATASectionNode,
00080         ProcessingInstructionNode,
00081         DocumentNode,
00082         DocumentTypeNode
00083     };
00084 
00085     KoXmlNode();
00086     KoXmlNode(const KoXmlNode& node);
00087     KoXmlNode& operator=(const KoXmlNode& node);
00088     bool operator== (const KoXmlNode&) const;
00089     bool operator!= (const KoXmlNode&) const;
00090     virtual ~KoXmlNode();
00091 
00092     virtual KoXmlNode::NodeType nodeType() const;
00093     virtual bool isNull() const;
00094     virtual bool isElement() const;
00095     virtual bool isText() const;
00096     virtual bool isCDATASection() const;
00097     virtual bool isDocument() const;
00098     virtual bool isDocumentType() const;
00099 
00100     virtual void clear();
00101     KoXmlElement toElement() const;
00102     KoXmlText toText() const;
00103     KoXmlCDATASection toCDATASection() const;
00104     KoXmlDocument toDocument() const;
00105 
00106     virtual QString nodeName() const;
00107     virtual QString namespaceURI() const;
00108     virtual QString prefix() const;
00109     virtual QString localName() const;
00110 
00111     KoXmlDocument ownerDocument() const;
00112     KoXmlNode parentNode() const;
00113 
00114     bool hasChildNodes() const;
00115     KoXmlNode firstChild() const;
00116     KoXmlNode lastChild() const;
00117     KoXmlNode nextSibling() const;
00118     KoXmlNode previousSibling() const;
00119 
00120     // equivalent to node.childNodes().count() if node is a QDomNode instance
00121     int childNodesCount() const;
00122 
00123     // workaround to get and iterate over all attributes
00124     QStringList attributeNames() const;
00125 
00126     KoXmlNode namedItem(const QString& name) const;
00127     KoXmlNode namedItemNS(const QString& nsURI, const QString& name) const;
00128 
00134     void load(int depth = 1);
00135 
00139     void unload();
00140 
00141     // compatibility
00142     QDomNode asQDomNode(QDomDocument ownerDoc) const;
00143 
00144 protected:
00145     KoXmlNodeData* d;
00146     KoXmlNode(KoXmlNodeData*);
00147 };

00166

00398 
00399 /*
00400  * Load an XML document from specified device to a document. You can of
00401  * course use it with QFile (which inherits QIODevice).
00402  * This is much more memory efficient than standard QDomDocument::setContent
00403  * because the data from the device is buffered, unlike
00404  * QDomDocument::setContent which just loads everything in memory.
00405  *
00406  * Note: it is assumed that the XML uses UTF-8 encoding.
00407  */
00408 /*KOSTORE_EXPORT*/ bool setDocument(KoXmlDocument& doc, QIODevice* device,
00409                                     bool namespaceProcessing, QString* errorMsg = 0,
00410                                     int* errorLine = 0, int* errorColumn = 0);
00411 
00412 /*KOSTORE_EXPORT*/ bool setDocument(KoXmlDocument& doc, QIODevice* device,
00413                                     QXmlSimpleReader* reader, QString* errorMsg = 0,
00414                                     int* errorLine = 0, int* errorColumn = 0);
00415 }
00416 
00431 #define forEachElement( elem, parent ) \
00432     for ( KoXmlNode _node = parent.firstChild(); !_node.isNull(); _node = _node.nextSibling() ) \
00433         if ( ( elem = _node.toElement() ).isNull() ) {} else
00434
